forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In downtown San Francisco, the night rests beneath a blanket of clouds, the gentle whisper of the wind weaving through the streets, announcing the arrival of a mild and pleasant morning. With the temperature lingering around 53 degrees, it feels cool enough for a light jacket as the west-southwest breeze dances at 17 mph, carrying with it the crisp scent of the bay. As dawn unfolds, the clouds will gradually give way to an expanse of blue, inviting the sun to break through and lift the spirits of those who wander outside.

Later, the skies will offer a canvas of mostly sunny splendor, with temperatures reaching a comfortable 61 degrees. While the wind will remain a tad brisk, its vigor will only add to the lively atmosphere of the day. For those eager to embrace the outdoors, it’s the perfect time to stroll along the waterfront or explore local coffee shops, perhaps engaging in the simple pleasure of watching the world pass by. As the marine layer retreats, the fog will retreat, hinting at an inviting day ahead. Dressing in layers will ensure comfort, allowing you to soak in the sights while remaining at ease. Embrace this day, for it is a rare opportunity to enjoy the unique charm of San Francisco without the weight of the fog.
